queries.query: SELECT * FROM linguist_translation WHERE identifier = 'presale' AND object_id = %v
SELECT c.* FROM django_comments c INNER JOIN django_content_type ct ON c.content_type_id = ct.id WHERE ct.app_label = 'ulule_presales' AND ct.model ='presale' AND c.object_pk::int = %v
SELECT * FROM linguist_translation WHERE identifier = 'news' AND object_id = %v
SELECT * FROM linguist_translation WHERE identifier = 'product' AND object_id = %v
SELECT c.* FROM django_comments c INNER JOIN django_content_type ct ON c.content_type_id = ct.id WHERE ct.app_label = 'ulule' AND ct.model ='news' AND c.object_pk::int = %v
